definition: to the greatest distance in space or time (`farthest' is used more often than `furthest' in this physical sense), (comparatives of `far') most remote in space or time or order
details:
adverb
- to the greatest distance in space or time (`farthest' is used more often than `furthest' in this physical sense)
= synonyms: farthest
- to the greatest degree or extent or most advanced stage; 'furthest' is used more often than 'farthest' in this abstract sense
= example: to the greatest degree or extent or most advanced stage; 'furthest' is used more often than 'farthest' in this abstract sense
= synonyms: farthest
adjective
- (comparatives of `far') most remote in space or time or order
= synonyms: farthest
